S06n568:1: atha khalu bhagavān punarapyāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimāmantrayate sma-tadyathāpi nāma subhūte striyā bahavaḥ putrā bhaveyuḥ,
S06n568:2: pañca vā daśa vā viṃśatirvā triṃśadvā catvāriṃśadvā pañcāśadvā śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā |
S06n568:3: sarve te māturglānāyā udyogamāpadyeran-kathamasmākaṃ māturjīvitāntarāyo na bhavediti,
S06n568:9: na cāsyā asparśavihāraḥ amanaāpaḥ kāye utpadyeta |
S06n568:12: duṣkarakārikaiṣā asmākaṃ jīvitasya dātrī lokasya ca saṃdarśayitrī |
S06n568:13: iti te putrāstāṃ mātaraṃ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ sudhṛtāṃ dhārayeyuḥ,
S06n568:15: sukelāyitāṃ kelāyeyuḥ-mā khalvasyāḥ kācidduḥkhā vedanā duḥkho vā sparśa utpadyeta,
S06n568:16: cakṣuṣo vā śrotrato vā ghrāṇato vā jihvāto vā kāyato vā manasto vā vātato vā pittato vā śleṣmato vā saṃnipātato vā daṃśato vā maśakato vā sarīsṛpato vā manuṣyato vā amanuṣyato vā āpātato vā utpātato vā aniṣṭanipātaḥ śarīre nipatet |
S06n568:17: evaṃ te putrāstāṃ mātaraṃ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ samanvāhṛtya kelāyeyurmamāyeyurgopāyeyuḥ-eṣāsmākaṃ mātā janayitrī,
S06n568:20: evameva subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāharanti |
S06n568:21: ye'pi te likhanti udgṛhṇanti dhārayanti vācayanti paryavāpnuvanti pravartayanti deśayantyupadiśantyuddiśanti svādhyāyanti,
S06n568:22: sarve te tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyānubhāvena adhiṣṭhānena samanvāhāreṇa |
S06n568:23: ye'pi te'nyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā etarhi tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya,
S06n568:24: hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca,
S06n568:29: kimityasyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā bhāṣyamāṇāyā likhyamānāyāḥ śikṣyamāṇāyā māraḥ pāyīyān mārakāyikā vā devatā antarāyaṃ na kuryuriti |
S06n568:30: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ kelāyanti mamāyanti gopāyanti |
S06n568:32: eṣā hi mātā janayitrī tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām |
S06n568:33: asyāḥ sarvajñatāyā darśayitrī lokasya ca saṃdarśayitrī |
S06n568:34: atonirjātā hi subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ |
S06n568:35: prajñāpāramitā hi subhūte tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya sarvajñajñānasya janayitrī darśayitrī,
S06n568:37: atonirjātā hi subhūte tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarvajñatā |
S06n568:38: ye'pi kecitsubhūte atīte'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06n568:39: te'pi sarve enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ |
S06n568:40: ye'pi te subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante,
S06n568:41: te'pi sarve enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante |
S06n568:42: ye'pi te subhūte etarhi aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā daśadiśi loke tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya,
S06n568:43: hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca,
S06n568:45: te'pi sarve enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ |
S06n568:46: ahamapi subhūte etarhi tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ |
S06n568:47: evamiyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ janayitrī,
S06n568:49: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-yadbhagavānevamāha-prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrīti,
S06n568:50: kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī ?
S06n568:52: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-pañca subhūte skandhāḥ tathāgatena loka ityākhyātāḥ |
S06n568:54: yaduta rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam |
S06n568:55: ime subhūte pañca skandhāstathāgatena loka ityākhyātāḥ ||
S06n568:56: subhūtirāha-kathaṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatānāṃ prajñāpāramitayā pañca skandhā darśitāḥ?
S06n568:58: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-na lujyante na pralujyante iti subhūte pañca skandhā loka iti tathāgatānāṃ prajñāpāramitayā darśitāḥ |
S06n568:59: tatkasya hetoḥ na lujyante na pralujyante iti darśitāḥ?
S06n568:62: na ca subhūte śūnyatā lujyate vā pralujyate vā |
S06n568:63: evamiyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī |
S06n568:64: na ca subhūte ānimittaṃ vā apraṇihitaṃ vā anabhisaṃskāro vā anutpādo vā abhāvo vā dharmadhāturvā lujyate vā pralujyate vā |
S06n568:65: evamiyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhata samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī ||
S06n568:66: punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāḥ sattvāḥ,
S06n568:68: kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāḥ sattvāḥ,

S06n568:377: yatkhalu subhūte tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yena yena yānenāgataḥ,
S06n568:381: iyaṃ subhūte tathāgatasya kṛtajñatā kṛtaveditā draṣṭavyā |
S06n568:382: punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgatena sarvadharmā akṛtā akṛtā ityabhisaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06n568:385: iyamapi subhūte tathāgatasya kṛtajñatā kṛtaveditā draṣṭavyā |
S06n568:386: prajñāpāramitāṃ hyāgamya subhūte tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya evaṃ sarvadharmeṣu jñānaṃ pravṛttam |
S06n568:387: anenāpi subhūte paryāyeṇa prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī ||
S06n568:388: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-yadā bhagavan sarvadharmā ajānakā apaśyakāḥ,
S06n568:389: tadā kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī?
S06n568:398: evaṃ hi subhūte sarvadharmā ajānakā apaśyakāḥ |
S06n568:400: evamapi subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī rūpasyādṛṣṭatvāt |
S06n568:402: evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī bhavati ||
S06n568:415: evaṃ hi subhūte lokastathāgatena dṛṣṭo bhavati |
S06n568:416: evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī |
S06n568:417: kathaṃ ca subhūte prajñāpāramitā lokaṃ saṃdarśayati?
S06n568:418: iti lokaḥ śūnya iti lokaṃ sūcayati,
S06n568:423: loko vivikta iti lokaviśuddhyā lokaṃ sūcayati |
